CustomField.formula:
IF( SME_5_20_Employees__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( SME_20_50_Employees__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( SME_50_100_Employees__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( Enterprise_100_Employees__c = TRUE, 1, 0)+
IF( Midlands__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( North__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( North_East__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( Scotland__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( South_East__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( South_West__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( Yorkshire__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( East_Anglia__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( Berks_Bucks__c = TRUE, 1, 0) +
IF( Arts_Entertainment_Recreation__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( Construction__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( Education__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( Healthcare__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( Hospitality__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( Manufacturing__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( Media_Services__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( Professional_Services__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( Real_Estate__c = TRUE, 1, 0) + IF( Wholesale_Retail_Trade__c = TRUE, 1, 0)
